title: Arena Help
description: In arena, you take control of two characters. Fight your way to the top of the board by taking down enemy HP to 0.

fields.title: Create
fields.description:
Create your characters by doing `wy!arena create attack1 attack2 defense1 defense2 Name1 Name2`.
Attack goes from 0-5, defense from 0-3.

fields.title: Battle
fields.description: Battle teams by using `wy!arena battle`. Battling teams is the way to gain SP, level up, and climb the ranks.

fields.title: Moving
fields.description: Use `wy!arena move PlayerNo MoveNo TargetNo` to choose your move, where each of the arguments is a number.

fields.title: Victory
fields.description: The team that wins is the one that takes the other team to 0 HP first. Characters with 0 HP are out and cannot move.

fields.title: Viewing
fields.description:
View your team's moves by using `wy!arena team`.
View the state of battle by using `wy!arena view`.
